welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bickley, a charming town known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that Bickley has to offer, and we hope you enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to VIP and executive travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at London City Airport offers a luxurious and exclusive experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gatwick Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The second terminal at Gatwick Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and data usage.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods by air.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Terminal 1 at Heathrow Airport is primarily used for domestic flights within the UK.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Heathrow Airport is the newest terminal and is used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Terminal 3 at Heathrow Airport is primarily used for long-haul flights to destinations outside of Europe.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Terminal 4 at Heathrow Airport is used for flights to destinations in Africa, Asia, and the Middle East.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Terminal 5 at Heathrow Airport is the largest terminal and is used by British Airways and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport for up to 4 hours.
